title-group.article-title: Genus Two Curves with Quaternionic Multiplication and Modular Jacobian

abstract.p: We describe a method to determine all the isomorphism classes of principal polarizations of the modular abelian surfaces $A_f $ with quaternionic multiplication attached to a normalized newform f without complex multiplication. We include an example of $A_f $ with quaternionic multiplication for which we find numerically a curve C whose Jacobian is $A_f $ up to numerical approximation, and we prove that it has quaternionic multiplication and is isogenous to $A_f $ .
